description: Documentation enforcement rules for git pre-commit hook

rules.name: Core Hooks
rules.message: Hook changes require updates to hook-architecture.md and ARCHITECTURE.md

rules.name: Core Agents
rules.message: Agent changes require updates to agent-orchestration.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, and README.md

rules.name: Core Patterns
rules.message: Pattern changes require updates to pattern-system.md and ARCHITECTURE.md

rules.name: Core Skills
rules.message: Skill changes require updates to skills-system.md and ARCHITECTURE.md

rules.name: Core Commands
rules.message: Command changes require updates to ARCHITECTURE.md and README.md

rules.name: Hook Utilities
rules.message: Hook utility changes should update hook-architecture.md

rules.name: Core Documentation
rules.message: Core documentation changes should be reflected in ARCHITECTURE.md

rules.name: Marketing Plugin Agents
rules.message: Marketing agent changes require updates to plugin README and project README

rules.name: Marketing Plugin Patterns
rules.message: Marketing pattern changes should update plugin README

rules.name: Marketing Plugin Skills
rules.message: Marketing skill changes should update plugin README

rules.name: Marketing Plugin Commands
rules.message: Marketing command changes should update plugin README and project README

rules.name: Infrastructure Scripts
rules.message: Infrastructure script changes should be documented in ARCHITECTURE.md

rules.name: Project Configuration
rules.message: Configuration changes require updates to ARCHITECTURE.md and CLAUDE.md

rules.name: Plugin Manifest
rules.message: Plugin manifest changes require ARCHITECTURE.md updates

rules.name: Component Counts Update
rules.message: Component count validator changes require README and ARCHITECTURE updates

bypassMessage: Commit message starts with WIP/TEMP - documentation enforcement skipped
